main_definition: Capable of being adjusted or modified to suit different needs, preferences, or conditions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Able to be altered in size or shape for fitting specific purposes.
meanings_and_examples.example: The adjustable wrench can fit various sizes of nuts and bolts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Capable of being changed in terms of volume, intensity, or strength according to requirements.
meanings_and_examples.example: The volume control on the radio is adjustable so that you can increase or decrease the loudness.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Easily modified or changed as needed for different uses or situations.
meanings_and_examples.example: An adjustable desk allows users to change its height according to their comfort and task requirements.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Allowing for flexibility in terms of timing, scheduling, or other planning aspects.
meanings_and_examples.example: Their flexible work hours are adjustable so that employees can manage their personal commitments better.
